review:
I faced a bad part ie., With the nurse  , cause doctor gave me a prescription in which there are no injection to intake , but while nurse started injecting salines she started giving her own prescription like the this injection that injection and started pressuring me ....  This the too bad ... I said them that am allergic to few medicine even then  also she is like debating with me... 

And one more thing which I noticed is that while Giving IV procedure, air bubble should not enter ,but there is a huge bubble entered and when I asked is it dangerous.... The nurse asked me in return " did u something happened to you ??" Nothing na .... This is really sick .... 

Doctor may be good but nurse and staff are too too bad....
Dr. Sarath listened and addressed all queries. However the staff and hospital management is amateurish because of which it appears unprofessional.

I went to SIMS hospital since I was in so much pain in my ankle region and this is the hospital that was nearest from the location I was then on that day. Once I reach there he immediately took XRAY but the XRAY was very badly taken, it was all black, and he never explain me any thing regarding my problem. Straight away by seeing that black xray he diagnosed that I was having a hairline fracture and have to do plaster on my left ankle region. I was in tremendous pain so without thinking for a second I obliged. he did  the plaster but with in hours the plaster went loose, when I called him saying the plaster is getting loose he said it's okay. After a week the plaster is broken badly, when I called him again he said that is not a problem. like wise the day came when he is suppose to remove the plaster. on that day after removal of the plaster I felt uneasiness on that region which I was feeling for quite some time now and informed the same to the doctor. To my surprise he advised me to get an MRI scan done as he was doubtful what could have been went wrong. I was really frustrated and left immediately. Even now also I feel uneasiness on my ankle area. I consulted another renowned  doctor with all XRAY and prescription, he was really shocked seeing the black XRAY and told me he didn't understand how based on that xray some one could treat a patient. Later he advised me to do another xray and after that it was found that for the hair line fracture the way the plaster has been done, the healing was not proper and for that the bone shape got bigger and hence the uneasiness. I would not recommend this doctor to anybody. I don't know how in practo he is getting that good rating.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I want to share with you, my experience with this clinic. 
The best thing about this place is the consultation fee 300/- INR, which is very affordable, but unfortunately your 300 rs will be wasted if you visit this place.

I took appointment with Dr Sharath Babu to get my back pain treated.The Dr talked to me very gently and asked me to get the X-Ray report.
After seeing the report the Dr said that the problem is with the spine curvature,which occurred due to the long seating in office and linked it to my IT profession.
** ********** ** **** ** ****** ********** ********* ***** *** *** told me to use a lumbar support belt, which surprised me.I bought all of them and went home. ***** ** ****** **** ***** ** ** ***** *** *** *** ****** ********** ******* ******* *** ***** **********
I was in total confusion and decided to seek second opinion from a different doctor.

This time i did enough research and took appointment with the best chiropractor and physiotherapist in Hyderabad.
The doctor saw my X-Ray and told me that the problem is with L5-S1 disk alignment. He clearly showed me the X-Ray and explained the situation.
In the same session the Dr corrected the L5-S1 alignment with chiropractic technic. To my surprise my back pain vanished away immediately after that session.

As my problem is resolved i went back to the shreya hospital ** ****** *** **** ** **********But the staff denied my request to return my money or exchange the medicines.
As those medicines are of no use to me, i told them to take the medicines without any refund and asked them to sell them again.those people took the medicines and kept them inside for resale.

I request you people to please be stay away from this place.This is not the right place to get your health treated.
reply_text: Very good my friend .u can have a lady chiropractic.with less amount with several activities.i think u will very comfortable with quack than professional surgeon.u can try lady accupunture .

review: I visited this hospital since it is nearby to my place. As soon I went and explained my problem ( cough and fever that too within 100 temp ) doctor recommend blood test and chest X ray. **  **** **** ** ***** *** **** **** **** *** ***** *** ****** ***** **** ***** ** **** ** *** ***** **** *** * **** Then I  suggested doctor that let me take medicine for 3 days and if cough does not subside I will go for test.Next thing was medicine, doctor demanded to purchase medicine from they in house pharmacy and when my husband went and took the medicine doctor just wrote on medicine when I should take the medicine and when we asked which medicine is for what doctor behaved unprofessional and decline to explain us.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review: Doctor was satisfactory to the extent, however supporting staff was not supportive. Moreover I had gone for the treatment of bone fracture of my father on the 6 th October 2017, *********** ********* *** **** * **** ******* ** ***** * and doctor asked us to revisit on oct 22 nd . But they again took the consultation fee of RS 200 , even after spending nearly RS 5000 on X-ray and treatment. This was not so for the other doctor ( orthopedic) , whom I had visited for the same bone fracture issue of my nephew. By charging consultation fee ,again and again just by citing trivial reason like , previous consultation is for only 7 days even after taking full treatment with them is definitely losing the trust and good will of the patients in my  opinion. I strictly recommend the hospital management to consider the policy of charging consultation fee , who took complete treatment with them for certain period like minimum 1 month.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Visited twice to the doctor and both the time after seeing the xray, he convinced me that there is hairline fracture. This time i consulted other doctor too (not in shreya) for confirmation and he said it is normal pain and there is nothing in xray which suggests hairline fracture. I will never suggest to visit Dr Babu in Shreya hospital.
reply_text:
Dear patient. I think Ur confused with twist injury of muscle and hair line fracture..
Pain will reduce with muscle relaxant and pain killers.

review: Visited for muscle sprain. Did X-ray, *** *** ******* Quality of lab is very poor and X-ray quality not good.finally gave tables for 1 month,those are not relaxing pain.But he has given some inspiration to start physical workout. He told it will be cured only by workout.

The doctor was too busy to listen to the complete problem - he just asked for a couple of tests such as Bone Profile and RA Factor. Surprisingly, there was no calcium or B12 test included in bone profile test. I am not happy with doctors response either he kept interrupting me and not listening to my problem complete and kept diverting the topic

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I met with an accident and injured my right foot. Because it was midnight, Dr. Sharath babu was the only available doctor. *** ****** *** ********* ** **** ******** *** ******** ******** ** *** ************ ** * ******** ******** **** ***** I was advised to wear plaster cast for three weeks. Two weeks went on *** ** **** *** ******** **** I had skin irritation from the tight cast. I revisited the doctor for the same. The doctor completely forgot my place of injury and case details. To my surprise he was calling it an ankle hairline fracture while the injury and swelling was on foot. He was reluctant to listen. He asked me to keep the cast for ten more days. The very day because I had severe burning sensation in the cast I went to a different doctor. ** **** ***** *** ** ******** ********* ** *** * ******** ***** ** ******* *** **** ***** ***** ** **** **** * **** ** *****

I faced a bad part ie., With the nurse  , cause doctor gave me a prescription in which there are no injection to intake , but while nurse started injecting salines she started giving her own prescription like the this injection that injection and started pressuring me ....  This the too bad ... I said them that am allergic to few medicine even then  also she is like debating with me... 

And one more thing which I noticed is that while Giving IV procedure, air bubble should not enter ,but there is a huge bubble entered and when I asked is it dangerous.... The nurse asked me in return " did u something happened to you ??" Nothing na .... This is really sick .... 

Doctor may be good but nurse and staff are too too bad....
Dr. Sarath listened and addressed all queries. However the staff and hospital management is amateurish because of which it appears unprofessional.

********** ***** ************* **** *** some x-rays and made us afraid saying some unrelated problem(Coccyx fracture). Prescribed medicine for 2months with some bad hand writing, none will understand except their staff, force us to buy from hospital medical shop. 
By gods grace , my old friend called me and suggested his friend who is a doctor and confirmed that its a ache due to strain.
 With 1 week of medication. It got cured.

I had lower pain and consulted Dr. Sharath. Î have explained him symptoms of pain. So, he listened very will and suggested tablets and said it is because of lack of watery in body. But tablets never reduces pain. So, I stopped it after 2 days.

  I had a bit doubt , it might be kidney stones problem. So, I took abdominal scanning. Finally what i thought is correct. I had 7.1 mm size stone in my left kidney.

My wife had ganglian to right hand, I hardly had the option to visit this hospital at that moment. Sharath babu was trying to show it as very big problem and also causing to the other hand as well. He prescribed around 1200/- worth medicine which you don't get any of the medicals except their own medical shop.

I went contintal hospital after two days for the next opinion doxotr just gave one stlint whic was cured in 21 days

Doctor explained the issue so well. He was treating us as his medico. The problem is with the medical shop staff. They are fuuling people by seling expired tablets. They are too smart by hiding the expiry dates with a marker.
